document_data.name: Ryul Ilbaereth
document_data.mainbody: '''Ryul Ilbaereth''' was an [[elf]] of House [[Ilbaereth]] who, with his followers, was rescued from death on the shores of [[Lake Eredruie]] in [[360 DR]] by [[Arun Maerdrym]], father of [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]].
